title: Fragments of an Alms-Film
original_title: Fragmentos de um Filme-Esmola: A Sagrada Família
overview: Fragmentos de um Filme-Esmola: A Sagrada Família (original title)  Maria works in a German umbrella factory as the foreman of the production sector. João Lucas has given up on living a normal life and practically lives in bed, in the midst of green plants. His father expressly desired that his son film this eccentric daily life in 8 mm format. Maria’s wages are dilapidated to the last penny by this amateur, monstrous, family movie production.
